meta.name: description
meta.content: The purpose of this website is to create a central location where students, parents, staff, and community members can find information related to the WCHS environment.
The purpose of this website is to create a central location where students, parents, staff, and community members can find information related to the WCHS environment.
The purpose of this website is to create a central location where students, parents, staff, and community members can find information related to the WCHS environment.

div.span: Thank you for your flexibility and patience as we continue Remote Learning Days at Washington Community High School District #308.
The district will continue to be closed until April 30. We will keep you informed of any updates as information becomes available.
Remote Learning Details (Subject to ongoing updates)
Remote Learning FAQ (Subject to ongoing updates)

div.a: Transition to Remote Learning Days Email (March 29)

div.span: Assistance will be available from 8 a.m. - 3 p.m.

font.span: Please email rjcook@wacohi.net or leave a message at
444-5607 to request a Chromebook for checkout.
<<Technology Help Desk Link>> Submit a ticket for help using this link

div.span: Breakfast and lunch available for any Washington student enrolled in school (Pre-K through 12). Please complete the form linked below to request meals.

font.span: Meals will be distributed M, W, F (each pick up day will include meals for two days).

div.span: If you are unable to use the link above, please contact Laura McCue-Newport at (309) 444-5544 or email lemccue-newport@wacohi.net.
